body: Ok, yeah that's what I have been doing. I tested my theory above by changing direct radiation to 0 for all times for all days during the year except for 1 day. Ran the genCumulativeSky component and selected the sky matrix for the single non-zero day. And got the same result as before. So using a cumulative sky is not my problem.. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/cYJbDW7C4z5nMXVDJ1PpKnLH3AFOC9nxaJvEXyaVQ7Ci9Ss5e-iWGRAyq7qQ5jokDOTMeJZSXuJ4bVzf1mZPrABH2x6SrQ84/singleNonZeroDay.PNG) Still can't figure out why I am getting the asymmetry!
